TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_trv_Tavila, title = Tavila, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Seediq]}, url = {https://trv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tavila} }

S.FORM: = Tavila = Gaga mniq Hwareyseyn Cwosisyang ka alang Tavila. 103 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 408 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 99% niqan 402 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 1% niqan 6 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Bunun91%, Tayal1%, Truku1%, Paiwan1%, ni rahuq na o4%.

= Tavila = Gaga mniq Hwareyseyn Cwosisyang ka alang Tavila. 103 sapah ka kneego na sapah, 408 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnposo seejiq o mangal 99% niqan 402 hiyi sp, rahoq na oxay tnposo seejiq o mangal 1% niqan 6 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Bonon91%, Tayal1%, Troko1%, Paiwan1%, ni rahoq na o4%.
